basics.name: Rasim Muzaffer Musal
basics.label: Associate Professor
basics.summary: An academician, currently residing in Texas, dreaming of mountains and oceans

work.name: Department of Information Systems and Analytics, Texas State University
work.summary: I have taught introduction to statistics, statistical modeling, data mining, probability and modeling courses, researched mainly in the areas of spatial models and fraud detection.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
